skills.name: Iron Will
skills.description: [SP: 0][CD: 20s] Wielder gains 2 stacks of Mind Mark. Combo ATK consumes 1 stack on hit to restore 12 bonus SP. CD:2s.

skills.name: Lingering Thought
skills.description: While wielder is on standby, team deals 15.0% bonus Physical DMG (Lingering Thought and Senseless cannot stack).
